metrics.description: Number of messages successfully delivered / Number of messages published. Under 80% is Red, 80-95% Yellow, above 95% is Green

job.template:
NOTIFICATIONS_DELIVERED1 = data("NumberOfNotificationsDelivered", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["TopicName"])
NOTIFICATIONS_FAILED1 = data("NumberOfNotificationsFailed", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["TopicName"])
DELIVERY_SUCCESS = ((NOTIFICATIONS_DELIVERED1 / (NOTIFICATIONS_DELIVERED1 + NOTIFICATIONS_FAILED1)) * 100)

NumberOfMessagesPublished = data("NumberOfMessagesPublished", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["TopicName"]).scale(60)

PUBLISH_SIZE = data("PublishSize", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["TopicName"])

metrics.description: Number of messages successfully delivered per minute

job.template: NOTIFICATIONS_DELIVERED = data("NumberOfNotificationsDelivered", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["TopicName"]).scale(60)

metrics.description: Number of messages that Amazon SNS failed to deliver per minute

job.template: NOTIFICATIONS_FAILED = data("NumberOfNotificationsFailed", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["TopicName"]).scale(60)
